sentences.en: All colour fades— especially under the impact of direct sunlight.
sentences.cn: 所有颜色都会褪色——尤其是在阳光直射下。

sentences.en: Draw simple shapes for your child to colour in.
sentences.cn: 画一些简单的形状让孩子涂上颜色。

sentences.en: Fill small holes with wood filler in a matching colour.
sentences.cn: 用颜色相配的木质填料填平小孔。

sentences.en: Her eyes suddenly met his and she coloured slightly.
sentences.cn: 她的目光突然和他相遇，她微微有点脸红了。

sentences.en: Her silk dress was sky-blue, the colour of her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她的丝绸连衣裙是天蓝色的，和她眼睛的颜色一样。

sentences.en: Her silk shirtdress was sky-blue, the colour of her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她一袭天蓝色的真丝衬衫式连身裙，和她的双眸颜色一样。

sentences.en: His water-colour designs adorn a wide range of books.
sentences.cn: 他的水彩设计使许多图书大为生色。

sentences.en: I wanted the front garden to be a blaze of colour.
sentences.cn: 我想让门前的花园变得五彩缤纷。

sentences.en: The course is designed to help students with colour and composition.
sentences.cn: 设置这门课程是为了指导学生如何运用色彩和构图。

sentences.en: The only difference between us is the colour of our skins.
sentences.cn: 我们之间唯一的差别就是肤色。

sentences.en: The petals can be cooked with rice to colour it yellow.
sentences.cn: 可以把这些花瓣跟米饭一起煮，使米饭变成黄色。

sentences.en: There are 20 full-colour pages of fashion for men.
sentences.cn: 书中有20张有关男性时尚的彩色插页。

sentences.en: These designs demonstrate her unerring eye for colour and detail.
sentences.cn: 这些设计体现了她对颜色和细节的精准眼光。

sentences.en: this lent colour and credibility to his defence.
sentences.cn: 这使他的辩护更具可信性。

sentences.en: Was he going to show the film? Was it in colour?
sentences.cn: 他会放那部电影吗？是彩色的吗？

sentences.en: White wines tend to gain depth of colour with age.
sentences.cn: 白葡萄酒年头愈久，颜色愈深。

sentences.en: With a nice dark colour, the wine is medium to full bodied.
sentences.cn: 这种葡萄酒色泽深暗悦目，是中等浓郁至浓香型的。
